articles.title: JWST captures the most distant star ever seen in incredible detail
articles.description: Astronomers have used the James Webb Space Telescope to take the most detailed image yet of Earendel, the most distant individual star we have ever seen
articles.content:
By Leah Crane
Earendel (see arrow)

articles.title: Memory problems after covid-19 more common in people with smell loss
articles.description: Regardless of disease severity, people with lingering smell loss three months after covid-19 infection are 1.5 times more likely to have cognitive problems than those who regain or never lose their sense of smell
articles.content:
By Grace Wade
Loss of smell due to covid-19 can come on suddenly
Shutterstock/DimaBerlin
Persistent loss of smell is a better predictor of lingering cognitive symptoms after covid-19 infection tha… [+3083 chars]

articles.title: JWST has released a striking new image of the strange Cartwheel galaxy
articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope has taken a picture of the Cartwheel galaxy, which got its weird wheel-like shape when a smaller galaxy crashed through it
articles.content:
By Leah Crane
The Cartwheel galaxy and its companion galaxies
NASA, ESA, CSA, STScI, Webb ERO Production Team

articles.title: Gamma ray bursts could help unravel how fast the universe is expanding
articles.description: It may be possible to use the brightest events in the universe, gamma ray bursts, to measure cosmic distances – which could help researchers figure out the universe’s structure
articles.content:
By Leah Crane
Gamma ray bursts occur when huge stars die in supernova explosions or when massive objects such as neutron stars smash together

articles.title: Strange pentagon is the best shape for stirring two liquids together
articles.description: The best way to mix together two liquids – like milk and coffee – is by moving two pentagonal stirrers in a jagged motion

articles.title: Record weather conditions made the UK's destructive wildfires possible
articles.description: A fire weather index, which estimates how conducive weather conditions are for wildfires, was at its highest ever level as grass fires raged on the UK's hottest day

Damage is surveyed at homes gutted by fire on 25 July 2022 in Wennington, Greater London, the UK

articles.title: Robot unties knotted cables but can't pick them up off the floor
articles.description: A robot that can untangle long cables with just two simple grippers may be useful in aircraft and car manufacturing or as a household assistant

articles.title: Shape of human brain has barely changed in past 160,000 years
articles.description: An analysis of fossils suggests changes in the shape of the braincase during human evolution were linked to alterations in the face, rather than changes in the brain itself
